title: Privacy by Design (Not by Promise)
description: Unlike apps that promise to protect your data, Clipposaurus is architected so we literally CAN'T see your content - even if we wanted to. Here's how our zero-knowledge design works:

stages.title: Generate Your Secret Key
stages.description: Privacy starts with you controlling the key

stages.title: Encrypt Before Upload
stages.description: Content scrambled before it leaves your device

stages.title: Store Only Encrypted Data
stages.description: We store gibberish, never your real data

stages.title: Decrypt on Your Device
stages.description: Content revealed only on your device
